Seminal Supreme Court Employment Cases In 2014

Law360, New York (December 19, 2014, 10:17 AM ET) -- The highly anticipated 2013-2014 U.S. Supreme Court term did not disappoint the nation’s employment lawyers. It was filled with hot button cases with a major impact on labor and employment law — ranging from cases with political implications, union claims and denials of contraception coverage under the Affordable Care Act. Here is a summary of this year’s major decisions.
